title: TestConnectionResult
description: TestConnectionResult is the definition that will encapsulate result of running the test connection steps.

testConnectionStepResult.description: Function that tests one specific element of the service. E.g., listing schemas, lineage, or tags.

name.description: Name of the step being tested

mandatory.description: Is this step mandatory to be passed?

message.description: Results or exceptions to be shared after running the test.

errorLog.description: In case of failed step, this field would contain the actual error faced during the step.

statusType.description: Enum defining possible Test Connection Result status

lastUpdatedAt.description: Last time that the test connection was executed

steps.description: Steps to test the connection. Order matters.
